ConfigureNetworkInfo:
It's really important to select the correct network adapter or otherwise you will not be able to connect with the client to the server. In most cases the name of the Network adapter looks like "Ethernet" or "Wi-Fi" and the ip address in most cases looks like "192.168.178.xxx".

The default port for Macro Deck is 8191. If some other application uses this port, you can change it.
Name: Name
Creator: Creator
Label: Label
MacroDeckMustBeRestartedForTheChanges: Macro Deck must be restarted for the changes to take effect. Would you like to restart Macro Deck now?
Author: Author
TheFolderWillBeDeleted: The folder {0} with all its action buttons will be deleted.
TheProfileWillBeDeleted: The profile {0} with all its folders and action buttons will be deleted.
InitialSetupLetsConfigure: Let's configure your Macro Deck experience
InitialSetupConfigureGridPreferences: Now let's configure the grid to your preferences
InitialSetupPickAllPluginsYouNeed: Pick all the plugins you need
InitialSetupDontWorryInstallUninstallPlu: Don't worry, you can always install/uninstall plugins later in the package manager
InitialSetupInstallIconPacksPackageManag: You can also install icon packs later in the package manager
NeverInstallDLLFiles: Never install .dll files from sources you don't trust! .dll files from unknown sources may harm your system, only install it when you know what you do! Do you really like to install a .dll plugin?
XSuccessfullyUninstalled: {0} will be uninstalled. Macro Deck must be restarted to take the changes effect. Restart Macro Deck now?
SelectAPluginAndActionToBegin: Select a plugin and a action to begin
IconPackCalledXAlreadyExists: A icon pack called {0} already exists
TryAgainOrDownloadManually: Try again or download the update manually
IconImportQualityInfo:
High quality icons can lead to an increase of memory usage and loading times especially when using many big animated gifs. 

For gifs it is recommended to use the low or the lowest preset.
IconSelectorManagedInfo: This icon pack is managed by the plugin manager
PluginCouldNotBeLoaded: Plugin could not be loaded. Perhaps the installed version of this plugin is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck.
XIsAnUnknownDevice: {0} is an unknown device and wants to connect to Macro Deck. Allow connection?
ShouldMacroDeckBlockConnectionsFromX: Should Macro Deck automatically block future connections from {0}?
FailedToStartServer: Failed to start the server. Perhaps the configured port is already in use.
PluginXCouldNotBeLoaded: {0} version {1} could not be loaded.Perhaps it is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck. Actions that uses this plugin, will not work until the plugin is updated.
PluginXCouldNotBeInstalled: {0} could not be installed. Perhaps it is not compatible with this version of Macro Deck
LatestVersionInstalled: The latest version is already installed
WarningDevVersions: Dev versions can be really instable and can cause crashes or data loss (configured action buttons, folders and profiles). You really want to enable the Dev update channel?
WarningBetaVersions: Beta versions can sometimes be instable and can cause crashes. You really want to enable the Beta update channel?
ErrorWhileLoadingPackageManager: Error while loading package manager. Perhaps you are not connected to the internet or Macro Deck is blocked by your firewall.
EnableIconCache: Enable icon cache (faster; higher memory usage)
ActionChangeFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the configured folder
ActionGoToParentFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the folders parent folder
ActionGoToRootFolderDescription: Change the current folder on the current device to the root folder
ActionChangeVariableValueDescription: Count up, count down, set a variable value and toggle variable value
ActionToggleActionButtonStateDescription: Toggles the state of this button
ActionSetActionButtonStateOffDescription: Sets the state of this button to "off"
ActionSetActionButtonStateOnDescription: Sets the state of this button to "on"
GenerateStaticIcon: Also generate a static icon of the GIFs first frame?
SelectedIconWillBeDeleted: The selected icon will be deleted from the icon pack {0}
SelectedIconPackWillBeDeleted: The selected icon pack {0} with all its icons will be deleted
MacroDeckUsesCottleTemplateEngine: Macro Deck uses the Cottle template engine. Click here for more information.
WhatDoYouWantToRestore: What do you want to restore from the backup?
ActionCannotBeReversed: This action can not be reversed
ThisWillDeleteBackupPermanently: This will delete the backup permanently
CreateBackupBeforeUpdate: Do you want to create a backup before the update?
PluginNeedsConfiguration: This plugin needs to be configured
ConfigureNow: Do you want to configure {0} now?
PressTheKeysNow: Press the keys you want to assign now
HotkeyExecutesOnPress: The hotkey executes the "On press" actions when pressed
FirewallAlertInfo:
After starting Macro Deck, a dialog from Windows Defender Firewall will appear.
Please check all boxes (Private networks, Public networks and if it exists, Domain networks).

If this dialog does not appear and you still experience connection problems, please visit the wiki or the discord server for help.
ActionSaveVariableToFileDescription: Saves the value of the variable to a file
ActionReadVariableFromFileDescription: Reads a file and sets the content as value for a variable
ActionSetProfileDescription: Sets the profile on a device
ActionSetBrightnessDescription: Sets the display brightness (Only on the Android app!)
BindableVariableInfo: The state of this button can be bound to the variable {0}. Do you want to bind the state?
ActionSetBackgroundColorDescription: Changes the background color of a action button
